Detailed Description

Encapsulates the Server table in the configuration database.

Definition at line 331 of file sqlserver.cxx.

void SqlServer::setRetryAttempts ( int  count  ) 

Sets the retry attempt count for this server.

It will attempts connecting until the count is reached. Or if the count is 0 it will continue forever.

Parameters:
count Retry attempt count. 0 for infinite.
